about_the_game:
Amy, a regular teenager, is playing her favorite video game when something extraordinary happens. Suddenly, the villain Ayashii Meiro mysteriously appears on the TV screen and pulls her into a dimension of labyrinths. Now, Amy finds herself in a strange and labyrinthine world, where every corridor and corner holds unimaginable secrets and dangers.



To escape, Amy must explore the labyrinths and solve the puzzles ingeniously created by Ayashii Meiro. Each labyrinth is unique, featuring different themes and challenges. Amy will have to use all her intelligence and skill to unravel the mysteries and defeat the villain.

But Ayashii Meiro is not the only threat. Along the way, Amy will encounter strange and dangerous creatures that will do anything to stop her. With her courage and determination, Amy must navigate the labyrinths, run through platforms at high speed, and collect the fragments of her soul to reach the next challenge.



With each labyrinth completed, Amy gets closer to freedom. Will she be able to overcome the challenges, defeat Ayashii Meiro, and find her way back home? The answer lies in the hands of the player, who must guide Amy through this exciting and mysterious journey in Strange Labyrinth.

name: Strange Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Sistema operacional de 64 bits
  • Processor: AMD FX 4130, Intel Core i5-4430 or higher
  • Graphics: GTX 750 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Amy is pulled into a dimension of labyrinths by the villain Ayashii Meiro, who mysteriously appears on her TV. Now, Amy must solve the puzzles of the labyrinths and defeat Ayashii Meiro to return to her world, collecting fragments of her soul along the way.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
